Name: Cyber Seraph
About the game: Cyber Seraph is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up where you will be facing diverse bosses on your quest to save your homeworld from annihilation. Collect chips from wounded bosses to unlock special abilities and push onward to final victory. Features 15 menacing bosses to take down (more to be released later) Pixel art graphics 8 unlockable abilities, with 24 possible upgrades Adrenaline pumping, nostalgia rich music (soundtrack can be downloaded / listened to on Steam) Full controller support Achievements Demo
Meta Title: Cyber Seraph: Jul 17, 2020, Cosmic Void and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cyber Seraph? Check out the release date (Jul 17, 2020), developer insights from Cosmic Void, and a complete game summary.
